name: AVO - Improvisation - 30 Years
additionalNotes: The Avo Improvisation consists of an Ecuadorian wrapper atop a Dominican binder and long fillers from the Dominican Republic and Nicaragua, while the Avo Improvisation Black is rolled with a much darker maduro wrapper (also from Ecuador), a Mexican binder, and the same mix of Dominican and Nicaraguan long filler tobaccos. The lighter wrapped variety hits all the right notes with a medley of smooth and creamy flavors that includes spice, leather, cedar, and hints of warm honey , whereas the maduro version fine tunes the palate with slightly bolder notes of anise, black pepper, cinnamon, dark fruit, and espresso.
